channel.title: GCSE English RevisionPod: Jekyll and Hyde
channel.itunes:author: Mr Forster, Mr Gallie
channel.description: RevisionPod - English revision made easy.Follow us on Twitter @GRevisionpodEvery week, Mr Forster and Mr Gallie bring you a dose of high energy revision to help you achieve the best possible marks in your English GCSE's. Each episode will look at a different question from your set texts and explore how we would analyse the language and contextual factors and how you can then use this knowledge to boost your essay writing. Click on the bio of each episode to download your GCSE RevisionPod handout, complete with the question we are discussing, the quotations and vocabulary we use in the pod and some extra contextual information.
channel.itunes:keywords: GCSE, English, Literature, Language, Shakespeare, Priestley, Poetry, AQA, Edexcel, OCR

image.title: GCSE English RevisionPod: Jekyll and Hyde

item.itunes:title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 4 - The difference between Jekyll and Lanyon
item.title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 4 - The difference between Jekyll and Lanyon
item.description:
Two men of science, and yet so different... but also very similar. A man who sees himself as greater than God but also akin to Satan: Jekyll and Hyde is nothing if not full of delicious paradoxes. So sit back, download the hand out, and allow us to explore them for you.

Get the hand out here:   https://tinyurl.com/sddv7ku   

Follow us on Twitter @GRevisionpod

Email us: englishrevisionpod@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:

item.itunes:author: Mr Forster, Mr Gallie
item.itunes:keywords: English, Revision, AQA, Jekyll and Hyde, Lanyon, Jekyll

item.itunes:title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 3 - Mr Utterson
item.title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 3 - Mr Utterson
item.description:
In our third delve into the duplicitous world of Jekyll and Hyde, we find out that Utterson is perhaps not all he seems. Is this man indeed the bastion of Victorian decency, willing to go to any length to help his friends or is there, as with so much in the novella, a hidden side to him? We also explore the shocking revelation that Mr Forster sympathises with the 'boring' member of the group who would much rather be reading a book than out having fun...<p>
<b>
As ever, the hand out, complete with all your revision needs is right here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zBl8OwISKIgdE80ua8cHxIivgn9Y0xY0/view
item.content:encoded:

We also explore the shocking revelation that Mr Forster sympathises with the 'boring' member of the group who would much rather be reading a book than out having fun...<p>

As ever, the hand out, complete with all your revision needs is right here:

item.itunes:author: Mr Forster, Mr Gallie

item.itunes:title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 2 - Importance of Place
item.title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 2 - Importance of Place
item.description:
In the fifth edition of RevisionPod, Mr Gallie and Mr Forster look at the importance of place in Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde. Find out why the end of term brings out every teacher's inner Hyde, why London was once a labyrinthine nightmare that played host to all sorts of terrible debauchery and why you should most certainly never judge a book by its cover (or a man by his house).<p>
<b>
Download the handout here: 
<b>

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dBITO6-NHnSjQTTOGvMXD-FgmrQ9sho6/view?usp=sharing
item.content:encoded:

item.itunes:keywords: revision, GCSE, English, Jekyll and Hyde, essay writing

item.itunes:title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 1 - Hyde as a Dangerous Outsider
item.title: Jekyll and Hyde episode 1 - Hyde as a Dangerous Outsider
item.description:
In the fourth edition of GCSE RevisionPod, Mr Forster and Mr Gallie celebrate that Friday feeling with a trip into the depths of Victorian London. Find out why Hyde is not actually an outsider (and why that frightens the Victorians so much!), why being ugly could be considered a criminal offence back then, and hear the brutal tale of Mr Forster channeling his inner Hyde by snapping a leg on the rugby field. <p>
<b>
Download the handout here: 
<b>
 https://drive.google.com/file/d/14g4mjdfbCHt3hWwOT-bZ5xdHn37uvXUQ/view?usp=sharing
